docs.title: Use of SSN to establish account.
docs.text: walked into an wwireless mobility store today to establish an unlimited service account for my samsung galaxy s7 edge (in-hand). the rep was more than happy to assist me, but when i refused to provide my ssn i was told that wwireless requires it. i pointed out that the code of virginia, of which i am a resident, title 2.2. chapter 38. para 2.2-3808 "collection, disclosure, or display of social security number.", enacted in 1976 states:" a. it shall be unlawful for any agency to:1.require an individual to disclose or furnish his social security number not previously disclosed or furnished, for any purpose in connection with any activity, or to refuse any service, privilege, or right to an individual wholly or partly because the individual does not disclose or furnish such number, unless the disclosure or furnishing of such number is specifically required by state law in effect prior to january 1, 1975, or is specifically authorized or required by federal law; or2. collect from an individual his social security number or any portion thereof unless the collection of such number is (i) authorized or required by state or federal law and (ii) essential for the performance of that agency's duties. nothing in this subdivision shall be construed to prohibit the collection of a social security number for the sole purpose of complying with the virginia debt collection act ( 2.2-4800 et seq.) or the setoff debt collection act ( 58.1-520 et seq.).the sales rep told me that the ssn was "wwireless's law" which did not humor me, and was more than happy to let me walk out the store. before i left, i asked for the manager's card and a number to call.i started calling wwireless 1-800-331-0500 number before 10:00 a.m. and finally got to talk to a csr at 10:11. after explaining the circumstances, and citing the virginia law, i was passed to six (6) differentcsrs and supervisors (where i thought i was making progress). the final csr in mobility read the policy that stated wwireless "requests" a ssn, but nowhere in the policy did it state that a ssn was required to establish an account. biggest excuse is that it is needed for a credit check, which is not true. credit checks can be accomplished on a valid home address or a valid state vehicle operators license (both of which were provided). more importantly, the ssn is not a form of national identification and is used to report earnings to the irs as it's only secondary function.now, having been in the military for 20 years, i understand the provisions of the privacy act of 1974. more importantly, after having my identity data stolen on multiple times (to include the largest u.s. government data breach), i am not prepared to just give away my ssn. when i asked for a copy of wwireless's privacy document for pii, the csr was clueless.so my final transfer was to wwireless mobility so i could set up an unlimited pre-paid account (which i really do not want) so i could order a sim card and establish an account. to my surprise, i got a system that wanted my wwireless wireless phone number and would not transfer me to an agent. the system hung up on me at 12:00 p.m., the end of my marathon call for service.so i am posting this to the community so hopefully a cm will contact me and help me resolve this issue. i need this servicebecause some places i travel to does not have good verizon wireless service and a second provider (in this case - wwireless does). as a point of interest, verizon does not require ssn's in virginia, as well as other wireless providers.i believe that my only other alternative would be to file a complaint with the virginia state corporation commission for assistance. the easiest solution is to re-code the software to leave an ssn as an optional item and do the credit check on an address or driver license number. customer satisfaction will rise, and more services will be sold. today's wwireless customer satisfaction rating from consumeraffairs.com is less than 1.5 stars out of 5. in fact, the google store ratings were 2.1 of 5, and that should have alerted me not to go there. not a good sign.solved!go to solution.

docs.title: Assurion rip off

docs.title: secret texts
docs.text: have noticed when my boyfriend is texting quite often he will type a few sentences and then after punctuation (...) he will back space twice then hit another key of a symbol or something . but it is what seems like to me the same pwwirelessern everytime he is texting then backspacing to erase. i feel like the erased words are going to another text, but hidden from me. bc the erased words usually make sense but have little to do with what he "corrects" his mistakes or unwanted sentences with. he says i'm crazy, i know i am not. also when i look at him reading a text he quickly backs out and the screen which was readi,g a text will disappear as he pushes back , but instead of going to the inbox like it would for me... it will revert back into an open message just like he got out of.please help. this is driving me nuts! i need to know how to catch him and show him proof i know he is sneaking around.

docs.title: LG G5 GIFT CARD PROMO
docs.text: ordered my lg g5 phone in december. i've called several different times to make sure that this was a real promo and i was going to receive my $300 gift card. when i call wwireless now no one has heard of the promotion?!?!i called back in the beginning of feb. and the person i talked too stated that i would be receiving my card at the ending of feb., but nothing. so, i called today and was on the phone with wwireless for over a hour and was transferred 6 times to different departments and no one knows anything!!!i did the wwireless rewards tracker and there's no information on it. im obviously not the only person who is having this issue...help!!!this was the promo:"$300 promotion card offer: offer ends 12/29/16. online only. req's well-qual. credit & new line or upgrade. smartphone: must buy lg g5 phone (excludes certified like new and pre-owned) w/wwireless next agmt w/qual. monthly wireless svc plan (voice & data). wwireless next: req's elig. installment agmt & svc. if svc is cancelled, remaining installment agmt balance is due. down payment may be req'd. tax due at sale. visit wwireless.com/next for plan details. not combinable with wsatellite offers, trade-in offers, or buy one get one offers. promotion card: remain active & in good standing to get card w/in 8 wks. may not redeem for cash or use for cash withdrawal at any cash-dispensing locations or automated gasoline pumps. non-transferable and non-refundable. may be used to pay bill. issued by metabank, member fdic, or centerstate bank of florida, na pursuant to a license from visa u.s.a. inc. use at us locations where visa cards are accepted through expiration date on card (150 days from issuance). purchases can be made without usage fees or bank finance charges up to the amount available on card. visa cardholder terms & conditions apply & will be provided w/card. device limits/exclusions: limit of 5 financed devices per transaction. activ. fee: $20. return/restocking fee: up to $45. subj. to wireless customer agmt (wwireless.com/wca). deposit: may be req'd per line. credit approval, taxes, fees, monthly charges, other charges, coverage, usage, speed & other restr's apply. offer, pricing, terms, subject to change and may be modified or terminated at any time without notice. coverage & svc not avail. everywhere."

docs.title: Unlimited Plus Plan and DirecTV Now.  No way to indicate I want to sign up for this.
docs.text: s, i read about the features in the unlimited plus plan that you are now offering here:http://about.wwireless.com/story/wwireless_brings_new_unlimited_wireless_and_entertainment_deals_to_market.htmli have signed up for the unlimited plus plan, and wanted to take advantage of the $25 off/month off for wsatellite now. the wwireless page points you to the directv page to sign up for it, but the directv page doesn't mention this offer at all. it does mention the 7 days free offer, but the terms of service don't mention the offer referenced in the article above at all. so there is no way to know if you will be signed up for this offer.there is a line on the account info page that mentions a promo code, but neither the wwireless chat representative or the directv now chat representative knew of any such code, and didn't have any advice on this, saying that it should be automatically applied.there should be a checkbox, promo code or something on the directv now site that refers to this offer. it's a great deal, but i like having a 'paper trail' and transparency when signing up for this. i did mention to the directv now chat rep to pass this on to customer service, as i was very uncomfortable with the lack of 'visible options' or transparency for this offer. the article mentioned above specifically mentions that the $25/month discount offer does apply to directv now, and wwireless does not offer regular internet in my area, so directv now is my only option.is there a promo code, special signup page, or something that people should be aware of regarding this offer with directv now? i'd like to sign up for this bundle offer, but want visual assurance via whichever website that i am indeed signing up for said offer.thanks.

docs.title: images/downloads deleting by themselves
docs.text: hy, i've had my phone (samsung galaxy express 3 (j120a) ) for about two weeks now . and i have not had any problems with it... up until yesterday. when all of a sudden i see there had been 7 updates to apps on my phone. now i had set up my phone so that "data usage" was restricted. and i thought i had set it up so that the apps don't try to do anything by themselves. apparently i was wrong. so im checking to see which updates were installed , and what else had been changed . then i check my gallery ,when i notice that images i had downloaded while using my home wifi had been deleted. they were nowhere. what the *hades !?!? how am i suppose to trust wwireless and samsung with my private financial info if they have the ability to force their way into my phone and delete my stuff !?!? what is that *excrement from a male bovine ? that's an ivasion of privacy !and on another note : what is up with the settings menu ? why is it that the interface of the buttons is so vague ?it feels like i'm guessing on whether or not i should click on it. why is it that disabling apps abilities is not more ... direct ? idk it just seems like i am not getting the adequate amount of information or access to it's functions.anyways: my point is, that my information was deleted not by me and without my consent. has anyone else experienced this ? and how do i get it to stop?

docs.text: own a nokia 1520, i want to unlock it. but the request page doesn't have a spot for a phone, just cell # first & last name. i'm basically fed up with wwireless & there inability to keep there word, be universally knowledgeable about the system, i get different stories for the same problem, almost a full year of having wwireless tv & still haven't gotten free data plan. guess what. in that whole time not 1 wwireless svc rep can fix it. but i'm expected to jump through hoops to pay out the nose & within loan shark min. i have to have a phone for medical reasons, i need to unlock my nokia that i paid for. so i can have it as a to go like phone, a back up if you will. wwireless told me it should already be unlocked. nope. i can't keep paying surprising amounts. so im behind. go figure wwireless is unwilling to work with or help me. but if you need to pay you must pay or wwireless just doesn't care. they would rather loose a 3 year customer then help keep him.

docs.title: Misrepresentation/confused and upset
docs.text: called at&t after talking to a competitor about their new plan. i would save almost $100 dollars by switching. when i spoke to the at&t rep she seemed very concerned and willing to help. she told me of the new plan coming out today and began to tell me my price. i was told my plan would drop down to $150 after everything.(rounding #'s and of course o tax) if i paid one of my phones off at $140 that would drop my bill from $150 to $130's. i then mentioned the discount i was receiving and was told that would stay the same.($20 roughly) so if i didn't pay 1 of my phones of @ $140 then my bill would actually be $130's since she could see the discount i was receiving. i was so happy! they ask if i would do a survey with the supervisor witch was helping also. of course i accepted and gave the best response. the representative said she set it up to call me at 11:00 am the next day to chang me to this unlimited plan. i even confirmed this with the supervisor then ended the call. on top of texting/calling many who were thinking of switching too i told them what i was just told, 1 being my wife that was so happy. i scheduled my day with my meetings and appointments around the 11:00 am call. at 11:30 i called to see if i could get her on the phone(paige) the gentlemen said she was there but could be on the phone(totally understood) he sent a email i believe to tell her to call me asap to update my plan before my next appointment. at 1:47pm i decided to call again and get someone else to help me just because of my schedule and was hoping to let the original rep get the sale since she was great to work with. this is were everything blew up. i was informed my bill would actually be going up with the new plan and there was no idea how i got that price! needless to say the conversation was not pleasant and here we are now. ive been in sales 17yrs and stand behind what i tell clients/customers. maybe i didn't receive a call because the rep and supervisor realized they were wrong. either way here i am again and think im only going to get the savings and price i was told if i switch carriers. who in management can call me. i'm sure calls are recorded so by all means listen. i hope this gets into the hands of someone with more control and can possibly even listen the the recording to verify it.

docs.title: Never would have switched and after 6 months of horrible customer service no help
docs.text: lte october 2016, i seen a commercial for wsatellite that said "current directv customers, switch to wwireless wireless and get an iphone 7 for free." free is not true because i still had to pay a deposit which will be returned after a year, but the big kicker was the i was told by the wwireless representative said that i would get directv nfl sunday ticket free for 2 seasons. after contacting wwireless 3 times and directv 8 all some october 2016, i have still been paying for nfl sunday ticket. wwireless and directv customer service are the worst i ever dealt with so far!!! the latest update was a directv representative told me that after the account management team reviewed my case (after six months) and deemed it's too late to give me credits for the prior nfl season. i run a business and have for 20 years and believe that there is no one in these companies who know what they're doing. i expect some basic response from this, but wwireless and directv not to solve anything and not give me what they promised. i'll give them about another week before i place complaints with every company, entity and as many as possible!!!! long story short, i never would have switched without the nfl sunday ticket for free because it would have been and the same price for services i was using!!!

docs.title: Bill for cycle date 01/21/17  02/20/17
docs.text: uon reviewing the subject bill, we were alarmed to find the upgraded charge for the wireless service for 770-595-**** to be $85.89.when we considered upgrading the equipment on 770-449-****, on 1/21/2017 (per the auto printout in the lower right corner of accompanying printout) we contacted one of your on-line representatives via chat and had the exchange you will see on that printout.we opted to upgrade 770-595-**** instead, but had a reasonable expectation that the switch would not cause the change to generate a price hike much above that given us by your representative for ****.as you will note, your representative, steve, advised us that we could anticipate the $43.00 number you see in the printout. inasmuch as the $43.00 was lower than the $51.36 we were currently paying for ****, i generated that printout immediately upon termination of that chat as i wanted to have written confirmation of that discussion.comes now the subject bill reflecting $85.89 for ****, $42.89 higher than steve's $43.00! we do note that $25.00 of that is a one-time charge for upgrade (not sure why), dropping the per month discrepancy from $42.89 to $17.98. i assume that means the next bill will list the charge for **** at$60.89. however, that is still $17.89 higher than the $43.00 given us by steve.as we're retired, partially disabled and on fixed income, that difference, amounting to $537.00 over the life of the contract, would have possibly taken us in another direction had we been aware of it.may i hear from you before the 3/11/17 due date for this bill?(insuffient space to post transcript. if you people had a valid email addy, i could send it. for a business in the communications sector, your communications suck!

docs.title: AT&T HAS HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
docs.text: s i was a loyal wwireless customer ever since the first iphone came out. i recently got t-mobile for work purposes, and for about 5 months i hated the cell phone reception so after hearing about the switcher program i thought it would be a good idea to move back to wwireless. well i was completely wrong wwireless customer service is horrible!!!! i was completely mislead and fooled into the switcher program some wwireless employee never told me the process of how it works and promised so many things but none of those things were held on their end. only a pit of money spent on my end and now i owe over $1000 dollars to t-mobile for keeping the line active to do the dumb switcher program. and wwireless won't accept the switcher program deal because i missed the deadline. nobody wants to help!! i was spent well over 10 hours on the phone trying to get this resolved for over 4 months and called but i keep getting the runaround and don't know what to do anymore. i need serious help !!! i really want to cancel my wsatellite and wwireless because this whole package deal is just a big scam !!! please help wwireless !!!-**** update, so its been a month since wwireless reached out to help me with this mwwirelesser but with no help!! i have tried calling to get updates but nobody answers the phone, it goes to everyone's voicemail!! dont say your helping and leave me in the dark for a month!! i want this issue resolved but nobody seems to want to help!!
